relation.text: wish much to be with my Family , my Sister -- the Hobart 's , The Bridgemans are there , and now
this Day fortnight , and am not better , sometimes Ly Carlisle comes
now . Is this the first time of your bei n g at Bath ? you will like
remember me kindly to Mr D -- To Mrs Dickenson No 2 Abbey Street Bath Honble . Miſs G . Decbr . 1786
